overview: The real Dana Vespoli is an impressive mix of inventive filmmaker and lusty sex star. Portraying a carnal she-devil in her Faustian feature 'A Thing Of Beauty,' she's equal parts beguiling and intimidating. The ambitious movie's story surprises, convincing acting, hellish imagery and clever special effects ignite a potent variety of sex scenarios in a depraved re-imagination of the classic devil's bargain.
title: A Thing of Beauty
